# ReceiverMicrophone

**Enumeration Case**

A microphone on a telephone receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
ReceiverMicrophone
```

## Microphones

- **Microphone**: An audio microphone.
- **HeadsetMicrophone**: A microphone attached to a headset.

items.description: A microphone attached to a headset.
items.name: HeadsetMicrophone
